mapper.select: select book_name, author, publisher, book_price, cover from books where book_category LIKE #{bookCategory}
select b.* from(select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from books where book_category LIKE #{bookCategory}||'%' order by 1 desc) a where rownum <= #{page}*10) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1)*10

select b.* from(select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from books where book_category LIKE #{bookCategory}||'%' and book_name like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by 1 desc) a where rownum <= #{page}*10) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1)*10
select count(*) from books where book_category LIKE #{bookCategory}||'%'
select count(*) from books where book_category LIKE #{bookCategory}||'%' and book_name like '%'||#{search}||'%'
select rownum,a.* from (select * from books where book_category like #{string} and book_name not like '%CD%' order by hitcount desc) a where rownum <6
select rownum,a.* from books a where rownum < 8 and book_name not like '%CD%' order by hitcount desc
select b.book_name,b.cover,b.isbn from (select rownum rn,a.* from (select * from books where book_category like '국내%' order by pub_date desc)a ) b where rn <8

select rownum rn , f.* from(select d.counts, e.* from(select isbn, sum(history_count) counts from (select a.isbn , a.history_count ,b.order_date from historys a join orders b on a.order_id = b.order_id where order_date between #{monthFirst} and #{monthLast}) c group by isbn) d join books e on d.isbn = e.isbn order by counts desc)f where rownum <=7

select g.* from(select rownum rn , f.* from(select d.counts, e.* from(select isbn, sum(history_count) counts from (select a.isbn , a.history_count ,b.order_date from historys a join orders b on a.order_id = b.order_id where order_date between #{monthFirst} and #{monthLast}) c group by isbn) d join books e on d.isbn = e.isbn order by counts desc)f where rownum <=#{page}*10)g where rn >(#{page}-1)*10

select count(*) from(select isbn, sum(history_count) counts from (select a.isbn , a.history_count ,b.order_date from historys a join orders b on a.order_id = b.order_id where order_date between #{monthFirst} and #{monthLast}) c group by isbn) d join books e on d.isbn = e.isbn order by counts desc
select * from books where isbn=#{isbn}

select count(*) from (select rownum rn ,a.* from books a join historys b on a.isbn = b.isbn join orders c on b.order_id = c.order_id where order_date between #{monthFirst} and #{monthLast} order by hitcount desc) d
